entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@RepLeeZeldin @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Total U.S. Coronavirus deaths: 

44,444 

Total South Korean Coronavirus deaths: 

236 

Don’t say this is nobody’s fault. 

Don’t say it’s about population size. 

America is only 7X as populous as South Korea — we have over 175X the deaths. 

Trump was warned MONTHS in advance. https://t.co/qehBoMFg9x
